entry.title: YTD v4.2 Beta
entry.content:
A new Beta for YTD v4.2 is available for download HERE.

Try it out! …And follow the development chat as always on XDA.

Changelog:

v4.2 BETA-2
-----------------------------------
[x] more downloads requiring mux now get actually queued (thanks Ultramanoid)
[x] long running audio-extractions in background don\'t crash - may pause only
[x] correct XDA thread link into About menu (thanks pandahunter)
[x] Khmer translation (as WIP)

entry.title: YTD v4.1.2
entry.content:
YouTube Downloader version 4.1.2 is available!

Changelog:

 v4.1.2 - May 04 2014
-----------------------------------
[x] update fix 
[x] another tab selection fix

 v4.1.1 - May 03 2014
-----------------------------------
[x] correct width for search and Dashboard-filter text fields
[x] correct tab selection when sharing links from other apps to YTD
[x] many updated and completed translations 
    (Chinese, Czech, Dutch, German, Greek languages, Italian, 
     Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Slovak, Vietnamese) (thanks guys!)

entry.title: YTD v4.1
entry.content:
YouTube Downloader version 4.1 is already available (after a fast transition through v4.0).

Changelog:

 v4.1 - Apr 29 2014
-----------------------------------
[x] light theme fixed / theme-chooser restored
[x] default ID3 tags for direct-mp3 downloads (mrdoug\'s idea)
[x] edit mp3\'s ID3 tags option into Dashboard

 v4.0 - Apr 27 2014
-----------------------------------
[x] new UI
[x] integrated search
[x] direct 1080p, 480p and mp3 downloads
[x] grab direct-mp3's quality from the Auto-extract audio setting (dafnis' idea)
[x] improved/fixed scraping
[x] Thai  and Japanese translation (as WIP)

entry.title: YTD's Second Beta for v4.0
entry.content:
2nd Beta for YTD v4.0 is available for download HERE.

Try it out! …And follow the development chat as always on XDA.

Changelog:

v4.0 BETA-2
-----------------------------------
[x] new UI
[x] integrated search
[x] direct 1080p, 480p and mp3 downloads
[x] grab direct-mp3's quality from the Auto-extract audio setting (dafnis' idea)
[x] improved/fixed scraping
[x] Thai  and Japanese translation (as WIP)
[x] updated and completed Chinese, Dutch, German, Italian, Russian and Slovak translations

entry.title: YTD v4.0 Development
entry.content:
YouTube Downloader version 4.0 development is almost finished. You can follow the development discussion (and download also a Beta) on the XDA forum

For the moment, the change-log is:

v4.0
-----------------------------------
[x] new UI
[x] integrated search
[x] direct 1080p, 480p and mp3 downloads

This is how this version looks like:
